name: Cordless Shoulder Heating Pad, Shoulder Massager for Pain Relief Deep Tissue, Heated Shoulder Wrap with Massage, Heated Shoulder Brace for Rotator Cuff(Gray)
short_description: Soothing Warmth and Massage for Aching Shoulders: After a long day at the desk or an intense workout, shoulder pain can make even simple tasks difficult. This shoulder massager with heat and vibration offers three heat settings from 40℃/104℉ to 75℃/167℉ and three massage modes, gently relaxing muscles and easing stiffness from issues like frozen shoulder or rotator cuff injuries. Experience shoulder pain relief and move freely again with this heated shoulder massage wrap.

Rechargeable and Portable, So You're Never Without Relief: Stop searching for an outlet when discomfort strikes. With its long-lasting 5000mAh battery, this cordless shoulder heating pad provides over two hours of consistent warmth and massage wherever you go. Keep it in your car for road trips, at your office for midday tension, or at home while you relax—your portable heated shoulder wrap is ready anytime.

Adjustable Fit That Works for You—No More Sizing Stress: Many braces fit too tight or too loose, making recovery uncomfortable. Our heated shoulder brace adjusts from 27” to 55” chest and 9” to 16” arms, and includes an extra strap to ensure a secure fit. Made with breathable neoprene, it comfortably supports both men and women as a true rotator cuff shoulder brace, so you can focus on recovery, not the fit.

Clear Control, Clear Comfort—Always in Your Hands: Stay in control of your relief without guesswork. The LED screen clearly shows your selected temperature, and a beep reminds you when the battery is below 5%. Designed for safety and ease, this shoulder heating pad with massage allows you to unwind without worry—it's a reliable shoulder heating pad built for comfort.

Your Year-Round Support for a More Active Life: This is more than a winter accessory—it's a tool for wellness in every season. Whether managing daily stiffness, boosting post-workout recovery, or keeping joints warm in the cold, this heated shoulder brace combines deep heat and vibration to encourage circulation and lasting comfort. A practical heated shoulder wrap and health investment, perfect for year-round shoulder pain relief and mobility support.
